You are my wife and I have affection for you. In return for that love, I have chosen to provide you with a house and some space. The property in the schedule below has become the property of my father. I have given you, free of charge, the property worth Rs. 7,13,000/- (Seven lakh thirteen thousand rupees in words) which has been in my complete possession since the date of its acquisition to this day. From now on, you are the full rightful owner of this property and you shall pay all the taxes due to the Government and enjoy it as you wish, having the rights of inheritance, donation, exchange, sale, etc., and enjoying the happiness of the moon and the moon freely. I hereby declare that I have not made any purchase, purchase agreement, court guarantee, mortgage, bank loan or any other transaction that may affect the property, and that I have full rights to the property, including the boundaries, letter of permission, and occupancy. I hereby give you this settlement deed, stating that I have full rights to the property and that I have no other rights to the property. This is not a government property. No guarantee has been given to the government or any government affiliated institution.
The property is not suspended under the A.P.G. Property Transfer Prevention Act No. 9/77.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 349 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Jalli Dannayya in favour of His Wife, Jalli Manga, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 72.6 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 6-151, Assessment number 539 (old), 214830000721 (New), comprised in survey number 345, situated in Korukollu Village and Grama Panchayath, Palakoderu Mandal, within the District of West Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Attili (512) is bounded as follows: North by: House of Jalli Jodiyya South by: House of jalli Venkateswararao East by: House of Banda David West by: Panchayath Cement Road.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
